metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7510 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The read_line_table_program function in dwarf_line_table_reader_common.c in libdwarf before 20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via crafted input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7510` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
